languages.text: Операция по борьбе с изменниками Человечеству, подстрекаемыми ксеносами, проведена успешно. Благодаря мудрости и воле светлейш{mf|его|ей} Лорд-капитана стала возможна окончательная ликвидация их богомерзкого движения, которая была предоставлена лично Вольному Торговцу — владыке мира Янус и вершителю воли Его.

traits.locale_text: Операция по борьбе с изменниками человечеству, подстрекаемыми ксеносами, проведена успешно. Благодаря мудрости и воле светлейш{mf|его|ей} Лорд-капитана стала возможна окончательная ликвидация их богомерзкого движения, которая была предоставлена лично Вольному Торговцу — владыке мира Янус и вершителю воли Его.

languages.text: The operation to combat the xenos-incited traitors to Humanity was a success. The wisdom and will of our illustrious Lord Captain made possible the ultimate eradication of that ungodly movement, and that process was personally overseen by the Rogue Trader — the sovereign of Janus and agent of His will.
languages.original_text: Операция по борьбе с изменниками Человечеству, подстрекаемыми ксеносами, проведена успешно. Благодаря мудрости и воле светлейш{mf|его|ей} Лорд-капитана стала возможна окончательная ликвидация их богомерзкого движения, которая была предоставлена лично Вольному Торговцу — владыке мира Янус и вершителю воли Его.

traits.locale_text: The operation to combat the xenos-incited traitors to Humanity was a success. The wisdom and will of our illustrious Lord Captain made possible the ultimate eradication of that ungodly movement, and that process was personally overseen by the Rogue Trader — the sovereign of Janus and agent of His will.

The operation to combat the xenos-incited traitors to Humanity was a success. The wisdom and will of our illustrious Lord Captain made possible the ultimate eradication of that ungodly movement, and that process was personally overseen by the Rogue Trader — the sovereign of Janus and agent of His will.

The operation to combat the xenos-incited traitors to Humanity was a success. The wisdom and will of our illustrious Lord Captain made possible the ultimate eradication of that ungodly movement, and that process was personally overseen by the Rogue Trader — the sovereign of Janus and agent of His will.

The operation to combat the xenos-incited traitors to Humanity was a success. The wisdom and will of our illustrious Lord Captain made possible the ultimate eradication of that ungodly movement, and that process was personally overseen by the Rogue Trader — the sovereign of Janus and agent of His will.

languages.text: 異種族の扇動を受けた人類の裏切り者との戦闘活動は成功した。名士たるロード・キャプテンの知性と意志で不敬な運動を完膚なきまでに撲滅した。この流れを直々に監督していたのは自由開拓者、すなわちヤヌス領主と、その意志の代行者だった。
languages.original_text: The operation to combat the xenos-incited traitors to Humanity was a success. The wisdom and will of our illustrious Lord Captain made possible the ultimate eradication of that ungodly movement, and that process was personally overseen by the Rogue Trader — the sovereign of Janus and agent of His will.

traits.locale_text: 異種族の扇動を受けた人類の裏切り者との戦闘活動は成功した。名士たるロード・キャプテンの知性と意志で不敬な運動を完膚なきまでに撲滅した。この流れを直々に監督していたのは自由開拓者、すなわちヤヌス領主と、その意志の代行者だった。

languages.text: 这场打击受异形煽动的人类叛徒的军事行动大获成功。多亏了舰长大人无与伦比的意志与智慧，我们才彻底挫败了敌人的邪恶。整场军事行动都得到了了加努斯的君主与神皇意志的代理人，行商浪人本人的亲自监督。
languages.original_text: The operation to combat the xenos-incited traitors to Humanity was a success. The wisdom and will of our illustrious Lord Captain made possible the ultimate eradication of that ungodly movement, and that process was personally overseen by the Rogue Trader — the sovereign of Janus and agent of His will.

traits.locale_text: 这场打击受异形煽动的人类叛徒的军事行动大获成功。多亏了舰长大人无与伦比的意志与智慧，我们才彻底挫败了敌人的邪恶。整场军事行动都得到了了加努斯的君主与神皇意志的代理人，行商浪人本人的亲自监督。

languages.text: La operación para combatir a los traidores de la Humanidad azuzados por los xenos fue un éxito. La sabiduría y tenacidad de {mf|nuestro ilustre Lord Capitán|nuestra ilustre Lord Capitán} hicieron posible la erradicación total de tan impío contubernio, y todo el proceso fue supervisado personalmente por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, {mf|soberano|soberana} de Janus y agente de Su voluntad.
languages.original_text: The operation to combat the xenos-incited traitors to Humanity was a success. The wisdom and will of our illustrious Lord Captain made possible the ultimate eradication of that ungodly movement, and that process was personally overseen by the Rogue Trader — the sovereign of Janus and agent of His will.

traits.locale_text: La operación para combatir a los traidores de la Humanidad azuzados por los xenos fue un éxito. La sabiduría y tenacidad de {mf|nuestro ilustre Lord Capitán|nuestra ilustre Lord Capitán} hicieron posible la erradicación total de tan impío contubernio, y todo el proceso fue supervisado personalmente por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente, {mf|soberano|soberana} de Janus y agente de Su voluntad.

languages.text: Die Operation zur Bekämpfung der von Xenos aufgestachelten Verräter an der Menschheit war ein Erfolg. Die Weisheit und Willensstärke unseres berühmten Lord Captain ermöglichte das restlose Auslöschen dieser gottlosen Bewegung, und {mf|der Freihändler – Souverän|die Freihändlerin – Souveränin}von Janus und Werkzeug Seines Willens – leitete die Aktion persönlich.
languages.original_text: The operation to combat the xenos-incited traitors to Humanity was a success. The wisdom and will of our illustrious Lord Captain made possible the ultimate eradication of that ungodly movement, and that process was personally overseen by the Rogue Trader — the sovereign of Janus and agent of His will.

traits.locale_text: Die Operation zur Bekämpfung der von Xenos aufgestachelten Verräter an der Menschheit war ein Erfolg. Die Weisheit und Willensstärke unseres berühmten Lord Captain ermöglichte das restlose Auslöschen dieser gottlosen Bewegung, und {mf|der Freihändler – Souverän|die Freihändlerin – Souveränin}von Janus und Werkzeug Seines Willens – leitete die Aktion persönlich.

languages.text: L'opération visant à combattre les traîtres à l'humanité manipulés par les xénos fut un succès. Ce mouvement impie fut éradiqué grâce à la sagesse et à la détermination de notre illustre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {mf|souverain|souveraine} de Janus et {mf|agent|agente} de Sa volonté, qui supervisa personnellement tout le processus.
languages.original_text: The operation to combat the xenos-incited traitors to Humanity was a success. The wisdom and will of our illustrious Lord Captain made possible the ultimate eradication of that ungodly movement, and that process was personally overseen by the Rogue Trader — the sovereign of Janus and agent of His will.

traits.locale_text: L'opération visant à combattre les traîtres à l'humanité manipulés par les xénos fut un succès. Ce mouvement impie fut éradiqué grâce à la sagesse et à la détermination de notre illustre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {mf|souverain|souveraine} de Janus et {mf|agent|agente} de Sa volonté, qui supervisa personnellement tout le processus.

languages.text: Zenoların yetiştirdiği İnsanlık hainleriyle mücadele operasyonu başarıyla sonuçlandı. İhtişamlı Lord Kaptanımızın irfan ve iradesiyle bu seviyesiz hareket, nihayetinde engellendi. Pek tabii bu süreç, bizzat Janus'un kurtarıcısı ve O'nun elçisi Hür Tacir tarafından yönetildi.
languages.original_text: The operation to combat the xenos-incited traitors to Humanity was a success. The wisdom and will of our illustrious Lord Captain made possible the ultimate eradication of that ungodly movement, and that process was personally overseen by the Rogue Trader — the sovereign of Janus and agent of His will.

traits.locale_text: Zenoların yetiştirdiği İnsanlık hainleriyle mücadele operasyonu başarıyla sonuçlandı. İhtişamlı Lord Kaptan'ımızın irfan ve iradesiyle bu seviyesiz hareket, nihayetinde engellendi. Pek tabii bu süreç, bizzat Janus'un kurtarıcısı ve O'nun elçisi Hür Tacir tarafından yönetildi.
